comments.content:
It's not quite that simple. More discussion at Typographi/ca/com:   
   
 [http://typographi.com/000865.php#000865](http://web.archive.org/web/20080415140223/http:/typographi.com/000865.php#000865)

Thanks, Mike.   
   
Anyway I think is sad to say goodbye to the editors of one of my reference books, but the fact that I'm talking about a book and not about their site explains well their situation.
